para.text: The Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, may issue rules to implement the provisions of this chapter. As of January 1, 2017, the Mayor may expand through rulemaking the definition of "covered employer" in section 301(1) to include employers with fewer than 20 employees.
Within 90 days after October 1, 2020, the Mayor, pursuant to subchapter I of Chapter 5 of Title 2, shall issue rules to implement the provisions of § 32-152.01.

annotations.annotation: Applicability of D.C. Law 20-142: Section 502(c) of D.C. Law 20-142 provided that § 303 of the act shall apply as of December 17, 2014.

Applicability of D.C. Law 23-113: § 3 of D.C. Law 23-113 provided that the change made to this section by § 2(c) of D.C. Law 23-113 is subject to the inclusion of the law’s fiscal effect in an approved budget and financial plan. Therefore that amendment has not been implemented.

Section 7080 of D.C. Act 23-404 repealed section 3 of D.C. Law 23-113 removing the applicability provision impacting this section. Therefore, the amendment of this section by Law 23-113 has been implemented.
